comments:
I have been using Windows Vista Ultimate RTM since November.  At first, it was very unstable.  I have tried various versions of the JDK, including the rev. 7 beta.  Right now, it won't even start.  I just erased my C:\Program Files\Eclipse folder and installed 3.2.2 (3.2.1 had been installed).  I am the computer owner, and User Account Controls is off.

Here is the bug report:

I noticed today that I had about 5 or 6 listings for Java in my Programs and Features pane (JDK, JRE, and a patch for revs. 6 and 7).  I uninstalled all of them but JRE 6, and I can now launch Eclipse 3.2.2.

This makes me this this bug is related to JRE 7.

This is fixed in 3.3.

On 3.2.2 you can work around this by using the following property to fall back to the JavaSE-1.6.profile

osgi.java.profile=JavaSE-1.6.profile

In 3.3 we fall back to the best matching profile automatically.  JavaSE-1.7 is still very early so we do not have a profile defined for it.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 154510 ***
